name: autocloser-agent
description: AI Sales-Closing Chatbot Platform - Convert leads into paying customers through automated conversations

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:agents"
scripts.build: npm run build:services && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:services: cd services/api-gateway && npm run build && cd ../agents && npm run build && cd ../jobs && npm run build
scripts.build:apps: cd apps/admin-react && npm run build && cd ../web-landing && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:services && npm run test:apps
scripts.test:services: cd services/api-gateway && npm run test && cd ../agents && npm run test && cd ../jobs && npm run test
scripts.test:apps: cd apps/admin-react && npm run test && cd ../web-landing && npm run test

author: MiniMax Agent
